txt.en: Deliver Lúfa's favour to Torferth at Torsbury
Bring Lúfa's favour to Torferth in Torsbury
Bring Lúfa's favour to Torferth at Torsbury
Lady Lúfa had given you her favour to deliver to Torferth of Torsbury as a token of her faithful but forever unrequited love.

'What is this you bring me? I recognize it! This belongs to Lúfa, daughter of Gísling...but did she not wed Ordlac of Oserley?

'You say that she did not wed him out of love? Alas, that we should be torn apart for politics and alliances. I will treasure this and swear if Ordlac does not bring her joy, he shall feel the taste of my steel....

'I am sorry...I should not speak so harshly before you.'
When you come to Torsbury, you should deliver Lúfa's favour to Torferth
When you come to Torsbury, you should deliver Lúfa's favour to Torferth.
Torsbury is overrun, and the people have retreated south and east
You should bring Lúfa's favour to Torferth at Torsbury
When you come to Torsbury, you should deliver Lúfa's favour to Torferth.
Torferth is in Torsbury, west of Oserley.\n\nWhen you come to Torsbury, you should deliver Lúfa's favour to Torferth.
Bring Lúfa's favour to Torferth in Tordag's camp
Torferth is in Tordag's camp, west of Oserley.\n\nYou should deliver Lúfa's favour to Torferth.
